text: If I transfer a registered package to an organisation on Github do I need to register again or it just work™ ?

elements.text: If I transfer a registered package to an organisation on Github do I need to register again or it just work™ ?

text: I think you might need to bump the version

elements.text: I think you might need to bump the version

text: Everything should just work because GitHub forwards all requests (unless you create repo of the same name in the original place again, of course).

elements.text: Everything should just work because GitHub forwards all requests (unless you create repo of the same name in the original place again, of course).

text: Everything will work for users, since GitHub will redirect. You should however still  do a manual PR to the registry, changing the repo url. Otherwise registrator will not work on the new repo.

elements.text: Everything will work for users, since GitHub will redirect. You should however still  do a manual PR to the registry, changing the repo url. Otherwise registrator will not work on the new repo.
